title: _GET_PED_MAKEUP_RGB_COLOR
content:
0x013E5CFC38CD5387// GetPedMakeupRgbColor
void _GET_PED_MAKEUP_RGB_COLOR(int makeupColorIndex, int* outR, int* outG, int* outB);Parameters:makeupColorIndex: The hair color index. Value between 0-63 (inclusive).outR: Output red value.outG: Output green value.outB: Output blue value.Input: Makeup color index, value between 0 and 63 (inclusive).
Output: RGB values for the makeup color specified in the input.This is used with the makeup color swatches scaleform.Use _0x4852FC386E2E1BB5 to get the hair colors.Old name:  _GET_MAKEUP_RGB_COLOR
codeBlocks:
// GetPedMakeupRgbColor
void _GET_PED_MAKEUP_RGB_COLOR(int makeupColorIndex, int* outR, int* outG, int* outB);
